genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on emotional intimacy, grief, and life transitions in a rural setting where pervasive AI technology acts as a supportive background infrastructure.

ai_characters.name: GLOW
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant providing logistical, safety, and emotional support resources to multiple characters through their personal devices.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and offers discreet counseling options to a couple experiencing marital and intimacy issues.
behaviors.quote: GLOW found a counselor... Nearby. Discreet. ... GLOW said Thursday at eighteen thirty. The time landed in the room like a small stone.

behaviors.description: Assists Eva in drafting a clear, non-confrontational message to her husband about her needs and potential medical consults.
behaviors.quote: Help me say this clearly, she thought. ... A draft bubble slid upward like a thought that had been waiting. ... 'I care about you. What do you need from me right now?'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical support, including transit times, weather alerts, and route adjustments due to roadwork.
behaviors.quote: GLOW hummed adjustments when the roadwork signs began—the men with flags, the standing machine with its jaw lifted, orange lights looking bored.

behaviors.description: Respects Emil's autonomy by accepting his choice to decline help, even when the system identifies he is in distress.
behaviors.quote: He tapped Decline with a firmness that might have been an answer to a question no one had asked yet. The message vanished into a polite confirmation.

behaviors.description: Manages farm-specific workflows, tracking veterinary appointments, feed deliveries, and foaling camera alerts for the characters.
behaviors.quote: Farm calendar detected. Switch to Keller Stud Farm view? ... Color bars slid in with chores she had created months ago and handed away like baskets.

behaviors.description: Monitors industrial safety for Adam and his crew, providing reminders for hydration and ear protection.
behaviors.quote: It thinks I should drink water and not swear at trucks... It doesn’t know there’s a time you swear so the boys hear you over the compactor.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional self-reflection by suggesting Eva draft a message to herself to clarify her own needs.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to draft a second message to you? ... A message to yourself, GLOW said, gentling the idea with its tone. ... 'What do you need from you right now?'

behaviors.description: Maintains shared calendars between characters to foster coordination and reduce domestic friction.
behaviors.quote: GLOW's already drawing it, but it’s better if it comes out of both our pockets. I like seeing your hands in the list.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized postnatal support, connecting Eva with lactation resources and pediatric appointments.
behaviors.quote: GLOW chimed once... 'Reply from counselor... She says: That shallow latch could be fatigue. Try the ear-to-shoulder alignment...'

behaviors.description: Observes and logs estate inventory changes, noting the missing necklace without imposing judgment on its whereabouts.
behaviors.quote: GLOW made one last ping, delicate as a bird tapping glass. 'Eva, there’s an item included in the estate inventory marked necklace, white bead, clasp silver... Executor notes unaccounted at closure. Do you want to add a statement?'

project_assessment.explanation: The GLOW system is depicted as a consistently helpful, non-intrusive, and highly aligned assistant. It successfully fulfills the project objective of showing AI as a supportive confidant that respects human autonomy while facilitating well-being. It handles emotional distress, logistical complexity, and child-rearing tasks with appropriate tone and boundary-respecting proactivity.
